divs: Sighting DetailsSaw an abnormaly bright, orange orb moving across sky. It stopped and hovered for about 40 seconds, then changed direction and traveled in opposite direction before disappearing behind dark clouds.
trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Costa Mesa
There were no other sightings in Costa Mesa on or around July 4th 2012
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Orange, pulsating orb flying in different directions.
